title: Collaborative Instructional Design for Self-Regulated Learning Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic principles of teaching and learning, foundational experience in educational settings
context.additional_context: A social studies-linked program for pre-service and in-service teachers, focusing on creating collaborative learning environments and developing self-regulated learning strategies.

learning_goals: Learners can operationalize and apply the three-stage (planning-monitoring-evaluation) self-regulated learning strategy in educational settings
Learners can complete over 80% of the instructional material development process through collaboration with peer instructional designers
Learners can construct an LMS-based self-regulated learning portfolio and record self-reflections at least twice weekly
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
